pr_title: HDDS-4327. Potential resource leakage using BatchOperation.

timeline.message: HDDS-4327. Potential resource leakage using BatchOperation.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't lock() be called outside the try block? If there is a chance that the initBatchOperation() can fail, then lock.unlock() would throw IllegalMonitorStateException as the lock is not held by it.
timeline.author: hanishakoneru

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Fixed in the latest commit.
replies.author: bharatviswa504
